job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Primary Skills:
1. Good hands on experience on AWS Container Orchestration ( Kubernetes, ECS
)
2. Good to have knowledge of REST API, Spring Boot and Microservice architectur
e.
3. Experience on tools like bitbucket/GitHub, Postman, Swagg
er
4. Good to have knowledge of CI/CD pipeline like Bamboo, Jenki
ns.
5. Good knowledge and experience on AWS ECS Farget, Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, SQS/SNS, Dyna
moDB.
6. Experience on Distributed Traceability tools like HoneyComb, X-Ray, Splu
nk etc
7. Good knowledge and experience on Synthetic Monitoring, Performance tools like
JMeter
8. Good knowledge of SRE concepts like Resiliency, Availability, Circuit- Breaker , Chaos Testi
ng, SPOG
Seconda
ry Skills:
1. Nice to have experience on Agile m
ethodology.
2. Nice to have Configuration Management tools (C
hef, Puppet)
3. Nice to have Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Cl
oudFormation)
